title: AI-Enhanced Multimodal Writing Education Program to Improve English Proficiency and Sustainability Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Writing Skills and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining Task-Based Language Teaching (TBLT) with AI tools and multimodal resources

learning_goals: Learners can complete topic-based English writing tasks with over 80% accuracy using AI tools.
Learners analyze multimodal SDGs-related materials (infographics, videos, etc.) and apply them to three or more strategic writing activities.
Learners can reflect on their writing process and develop revision plans using peer feedback and AI analysis tools.

resources: AI Writing Assistance Tools (e.g., Grammarly, ChatGPT)
Multimodal Resource Database Related to SDGs
Online Collaboration Platforms (e.g., Google Docs, Padlet)
Weekly Assignment Templates and Assessment Rubrics

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
